author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Archive the given session (If the session has no content it will fail)
commands.name: cb-archive

commands.description: Cancel the given command. Only pending commands can be canceled.
commands.name: cb-command-cancel

commands.description: Display information on command
commands.name: cb-command-info

commands.description: Delete a given file in the session from Cb server.
commands.name: cb-file-delete

commands.description: Download a file from Cb server in a given session.
commands.name: cb-file-get

commands.description: Get file info for a given file in a session
commands.name: cb-file-info

commands.description: Uploads the file to the Cb server. Use cb-push-file-to-endpoint instead.
commands.name: cb-file-upload

commands.description: Keep the session alive to avoid closing due to timeout
commands.name: cb-keepalive

commands.description: List the CarbonBlack existing commands for a given session
commands.name: cb-list-commands

commands.description: List files in a given session
commands.name: cb-list-files

commands.description: List the CarbonBlack sessions
commands.name: cb-list-sessions

commands.description: Close the given session
commands.name: cb-session-close

commands.description: Create a new CarbonBlack session for a given sensor
commands.name: cb-session-create

commands.description: Create a new CarbonBlack session for a given sensor and wait for it to be active
commands.name: cb-session-create-and-wait

commands.description: Display session info
commands.name: cb-session-info

commands.description: Terminates a process at the sensor/endpoint
commands.name: cb-process-kill

commands.description: List directories on the endpoint.
commands.name: cb-directory-listing

commands.description: Run executable on the endpoint.
commands.name: cb-process-execute

commands.description: Deprecated - use cb-memdump instead.
commands.name: cb-memdeump

commands.description: Create a live response command. Use cb-session-create instead.
commands.name: cb-command-create

commands.description: Create a live response command and wait for it to finish executing
commands.name: cb-command-create-and-wait

commands.description: Terminates a process at the sensor/endpoint
commands.name: cb-terminate-process

commands.description: Delete a file from the endpoint.
commands.name: cb-file-delete-from-endpoint

commands.description: Enumerate registry values
commands.name: cb-registry-get-values

commands.description: Query for registry value.
commands.name: cb-registry-query-value

commands.description: Create a new registry key.
commands.name: cb-registry-create-key

commands.description: Delete registry key.
commands.name: cb-registry-delete-key

commands.description: Delete registry value.
commands.name: cb-registry-delete-value

commands.description: Set registry value.
commands.name: cb-registry-set-value

commands.description: List processes running on the endpoint.
commands.name: cb-process-list

commands.description:
Retrieves a file from a path on the endpoint.
For large files, set the "download" argument to "false". Verify that the command completed by using the !cb-command-info command.
After the command completes, download the file using the !cb-file-get command.
commands.name: cb-get-file-from-endpoint

commands.description: Save a file to a specific path on the endpoint.
commands.name: cb-push-file-to-endpoint

commands.description: Executes an endpoint memory dump.
commands.name: cb-memdump

integration.description: Collect information and take action on remote endpoints in real time with VMware Carbon Black EDR (Live Response API) (formerly known as Carbon Black Enterprise Live Response).
integration.name: VMware Carbon Black EDR (Live Response API)

playbook.name: Carbon Black Live Response - Create active session

playbook.description:
This playbook retrieves a file from a path on an endpoint using VMware Carbon Black EDR (Live Response API).
Make sure to provide the Carbon Black sensor ID of the endpoint from which you want to retrieve the file.
playbook.name: Get File Sample From Path - VMware Carbon Black EDR - Live Response API

playbook.description: Polling command status until finished with an error or complete.
playbook.name: Carbon Black Live Response - Wait Until Command Complete
Carbon Black Live Response - Download File

description: Collect information and take action on remote endpoints in real time with Carbon Black Enterprise Live Response.

integrations.name: VMware Carbon Black EDR (Live Response API)

name: Carbon Black Enterprise Live Response
